summary: Implemented a centralized frontend public-domain configuration (VITE_PUBLIC_DOMAIN + fallbacks), updated marketing header/footer logo URLs to use it, added a read-only Public Domain item to the setup checklist UI, and updated the standalone static landing page to use a single domain constant for asset URL construction. Deployment docs include a new "Changing the Domain" section but the provided diff snippet is truncated before confirming all required details.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deployment documentation must explicitly list all project locations affected by a domain change (including the standalone landing page) and explain how to keep the React app domain setting and standalone landing page domain setting in sync.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a new "Changing the Domain" section, but the visible content is truncated before it demonstrates (a) an explicit list of all affected locations and (b) explicit instructions to update/keep in sync the standalone landing page setting alongside the React app setting.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking metadata (project_state.json) with AR items and statuses.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for any project management/state JSON updates; this appears unrelated to the domain-reference change requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced or modified a generated "frontend-file-summaries.txt" artifact describing many frontend files and features (including a new /admin/setup route mention).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request adding summary artifacts or describing other marketing/site content changes; this file is not part of the requested domain-configuration work.
